title: Pony Express National Historic Trail: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go       The Pony Express National Historic Trail Interactive Map! Here's a fun, exciting way to find places to visit. Zoom in to find a location. Click on the yellow balloon of your choice to see the site name, address, access, image, and website. Note: Not all sites have images (yet).     Error: You have supplied an invalid NPMap ID. Please edit this element's data and check to ensure the id is correct.      There are many places of history and commemoration on the Pony Express National Historic Trail to visit. Museums, interpretive centers, and historic sites provide information and interpretation. Please contact each site before you go to obtain current information on closures, changes in hours, and fees.       Selected Sites on the Pony Express National Historic Trail Click the links below to learn about selected trail sites on the Pony Express National Historic Trail. Below the links is a simple map showing the general location of each site.  Pony Express Stable - St. Joseph, Missouri Patee House - St. Joseph, Missouri Marysville Pony Express Barn - Marysville, Kansas Hollenberg Station - Hanover, Kansas Rock Creek Station - Fairbury, Nebraska Fort Caspar - Casper, Wyoming Camp Floyd/Stagecoach Inn - Fairfield, Utah Simpson Springs - Tooele County, Utah Fort Churchill - Silver Springs, Nevada B.F. Hastings Building - Old Sacramento, California         Photo image map of suggested Pony Express sites to visit. NPS Image
